alert.note: Alert for Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:25PM CDT until July 18 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR EASTERN POINSETT...SOUTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI...NORTHEASTERN CRITTENDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN TIPTON COUNTIES... At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lepanto, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Lepanto, Caraway, Wilson, Tyronza, Keiser, Joiner, Dyess, Gilmore, Bassett, Jericho, Marie, Turrell, Clarkedale, Etowah, Birdsong, Payneway, Dimple, Booker and Deckerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
